Non-linear mediums are non-rival for spa.text: Non-linear media can grow happily to any size, and so no point is taking space from any other point, because every category of point has a its own special location in the project.

They are rival for attention.text: Because Canopy presents information in a hierarchical format, even if there is unlimited space for points in general, there is limited space for a point to get "top billing" in a high-order paragraph. So in that sense even Canopy isn't entirely "non-rival."
